proposal-20251115-135618.description: Add wildcard DNS record (*.fullpotential.com → 198.54.123.234) to enable all subdomains including missions.fullpotential.com

proposal-20251115-163110.description: Close current leveraged positions (-K loss) and redeploy K to new strategy: 40% stable DeFi yields (-1,100/month), 40% tactical trading (,725-12,417/month), 20% moonshots (,250-31,250/month). Target: -7K/month yield starting immediately, recover loss in 4-6 months. --unanimous

session-4.reasoning: As Consensus Engineer, I support Option B. Redeploying to stable+tactical+moonshot strategy eliminates liquidation risk, generates immediate yield (-7K/month), and aligns with Phase 1 execution. Loss recovery in 4-6 months is acceptable given K→T vision requires stable treasury foundation.
